description:
A claustrophobic timpanist and an okama, 3rd-year studen Masumi has a crush on Chiaki and considers Nodame a rival and often bullies her and anyone else who tries to get close to Chiaki. Despite his idiosyncrasies, he excels on his percussion skills, earning him the title of "Queen of Percussion" and a place in the S and Râ˜†S orchestras conducted by Chiaki.
Adapted from Wikipedia
name: Okuyama Masumi
